Page Profile Discussions: This widget forms the Discussions tab on the Page Profile and displays the discussions of the Page. It should be placed in the Tabbed Blocks area of the Page Profile.
Sayfa Profile Discussions: This widget forms the Discussions tab on the Sayfa Profile and displays the discussions of the Sayfa. It should be placed in the Tabbed Blocks area of the Sayfa Profile.
Most Discussed Sayfalar

Page Profile Discussions: Displays list of Pages having maximum number of discussions.
Sayfa Profile Discussions: Displays list of Sayfalar having maximum number of discussions.
Count

Page Profile Discussions: Forms the Discussions tab of your Page. It should be placed in the Tabbed Blocks area of the Page Profile.
Sayfa Profile Discussions: Forms the Discussions tab of your Sayfa. It should be placed in the Tabbed Blocks area of the Sayfa Profile.
